commit message:
Merge pull request #43 from zdila/master

add support for media button for android 3.0 and later

[issue #254] Upgraded OSMDroid to fix a Mapnik tile issue

Mapnik tiles were broken in the version of OSMDroid we use because of
https://code.google.com/p/osmdroid/issues/detail?id=515 . Upgraded to
the latest version to fix it.

Fix dialog progress when exporting multiple tracks

The progress dialog never really worked when exporting multiple tracks,
fix it by making the export task able to take a list of tracks and
manage the dialog by itsef.
